1.content:
Here you'll pick from 4 options.

The option to play as Jake Skylily while he is noticed throughout his putty life. And the path where he isn't noticed

Or the same, but with Ginny Tatcher!

Quick Notes:

These two are made of putty instead of goo/gum like my bud Derpatron's other characters, so they're a fair bit sturdier then the Gooey Kids.

They're easily moldable and squishable, able to flatten out nicely and can pop right back given enough time, but unlike the gooey kids they get hard and brittle in the heat and the cold doesn't really bother them too much.

They're also both functionally immortal, but acids are a coin flip if they'll become a hunk of shit, or get molded into a turd and crapped out, still alive.

11.title: Jake Skylily (Noticed)

choices: First day at a new school.
A day at the amusement park.
111.content: At Jake's current age, he has only now renamed himself, after a rather horrible first day at his old school. After being mocked for his girl's name and the "super cute" clothes his sister picked out for him, he's now adopted a new name and appearance, preferring dark clothing and interests rather than his sister's bright colors and pastels, which have pretty much taken over the house ever since his baby sister, Sunny, was born. He's still pretty reserved, but he has a bit of an attitude and sometimes throws a fit if he's forced to do something he doesn't want to. While his big sister Daisy is usually nice to him (TOO nice for his liking), she sometimes plays with him a bit to try and get him to lighten up.
111.title: Jake- Age 7

1111.content:
"Come on, little bro, you're gonna be late for your first day at your new school!", you hear Daisy cry out from downstairs. "Hurry up! I picked the cutest little outfit for you to wear!" Your sister seemed to be looking forward to this than you were, though that's not saying much. You hate school. You wish the sun could explode and burn down every school everywhere. That's how much you hate it. The kids in the last school you were at didn't treat you very well. It all started when it came time to introduce yourself. There you were, your brightly colored tie-dye shirt and purple shorts, already looking pretty girly, when you were asked your name. Rose Skylily. That was the name you were born with, for whatever cruel reason your weird parents thought of. The kids thought you were a girl until you told them you were a boy. At recess, one of the meaner boys thought it would be funny to make the girly boy cry, and discovered your condition. After that, the bullies had made you their personal seat cushion, among other things. Now that your family has moved away, you had a chance to start over. You had been wearing dark clothing and had been watching some darker cartoons for some time now. You had even picked out a new name to go by: Jake.

"Rosie, come down here already!"
It had yet to catch on with your sister and parents. After eating breakfast, rejecting your sister's outfit, and being driven to school, your big sister lead you to your class and somehow managed to not embarrass you.
"Now class, we have a new student today. I'd like you all to make Ro-"
"Jake", you said, interrupting the teacher as she introduced you to the class. "My name's Jake, ma'am."
The teacher thought for a moment and decided to go with it. She figured your name was a pretty big problem for you. "Alright Jake, I'd like you to take your seat in the empty desk beside..."
1111.title: New school, new name.

choices: The class finished without incident but outside is a different story

11112.content:
Tyler had troublemaker written all over him. It was obvious from the state of his desk, his position away from the front of the class and the crude sketches carved into his desk and littering his notebook. If that didn't make enough of an impression his hair was dirty blonde and greasy, clearly not having been washed in ages. His exposed skin was covered in dirt, bruises and various other marks that indicated an active and aggressive style of work and play.

You walk over to your new desk mate, trying to keep your attitude reserved and 'bad' while not letting him see you sweat. "Hi" you mutter is what you think is a bored uncaring tone. With a grunt Tyler turns back to his notebook and crude drawings. As you sit your hit by a wave of unpleasant body odor, it seems like his hair isn't the only thing Tyler neglects to wash and it only gets worse when he puts his arms behind his back exposing his stained armpits.

For the first part of the class things seem to be going well, your able to keep up with the teacher and aside from a few mutters of gossip the class seems to have forgotten you, just the way you hoped. But how long will the good fortune last?

info.brief_description: Follow the lives of two malleable kids through various parts of their lives.
info.description:
Co-created by me and Mataku.

Follow the story of two kids, both with the same unusual condition, brought on by different events. Both kids have lived their entire lives with a putty-like body. After a certain age, they will give off a scent that, while attracts various animals, it makes humans ignore their presence, as if they weren't there at all. Of course, this doesn't mean that they are safe from them. Far from it.

Characters:
Jake Skylily (birth name is Rose)
(flavor: licorice)
A young goth boy. To him, life seems to get a real kick out of his misery. On top of his parents having given him a really embarrassing name, he's surrounded by his giddy and eternally cheerful sisters, and his super weird parents, who like to think they're adventurers. So obviously, they're rarely around, leaving him in the care of his older sister, Daisy, and his younger sister, Sunny, who try to get him to be less dark and brooding. He's gone by Jake ever since a rather horrible first day of school when he was younger. His condition is thanks to his mother having eaten an odd fruit while she was pregnant with him.

Ginny Thatcher
(flavor: orange)
A somewhat reclusive geeky girl. Her parents being world renowned scientists, Ginny has always taken an interest in robotics and chemistry. She often roleplays online (under her older brother Alexander's supervision) and has a great fascination with science fiction and medieval fantasy, often dreaming of when her knight will rescue her from her life of seclusion. Her little brother, Daniel, sees her hobbies as boring and tries to get her to play with him (though he often gets carried away. Her condition is the result of one of her mother's experiments going wrong shortly before she became pregnant with her.

Rules:

1) Jake and Ginny can be killed, but keep them alive for a while if you choose to do so.

2) When adding chapters, make them have a decent length and we can actually read them.

3) No copying other peoples' work and adding it here, or vice-versa. That's not cool.

4) Keep their ages consistent (difference between Daisy/Alexander and Jake/Ginny is 5 years, and 7 years between them and Sunny/Daniel respectively)

5) (06/08/2015) If a there's a sudden development that doesn't make any damn sense, or if a chapter is nothing but a sentence long, I will delete the chapter without hesitation. HOWEVER if it's clear that some effort is put into it, I'll simply email you before going over and fixing grammatical or continuity errors.

Anything else is fair game.
